question.title: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: org.thymeleaf.templateresolver.ITemplateResolver
question.body:
I have a Maven project (plain Java, not Spring) with the following dependency:

<dependency>
  <groupId>org.thymeleaf</groupId>
  <artifactId>thymeleaf</artifactId>
  <version>3.1.3.RELEASE</version>
</dependency>

and this plugin:

<plugin>
    <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
    <artifactId>maven-javadoc-plugin</artifactId>
    <version>3.4.1</version>
    <executions>
      <execution>
        <goals>
          <goal>javadoc</goal>
        </goals>
        <phase>install</phase>
        <configuration>
          <doclet>javadoc.CustomDoclet</doclet>
          <docletPath>${project.build.outputDirectory}</docletPath>
        </configuration>
      </execution>
    </executions>
    <configuration>
      <additionalOptions>
        <option>-subpackages</option>
        <option>ch.geosatis.kstreams.irisevents.events</option>
      </additionalOptions>
      <failOnError>true</failOnError>
      <tags>
        <tag><name>name.</name></tag>
        <tag><name>type.</name></tag>
        <tag><name>topic.</name></tag>
        <tag><name>category.</name></tag>
        <tag><name>example.</name></tag>
        <tag><name>format.</name></tag>
        <tag><name>unit.</name></tag>
      </tags>      
    </configuration>
</plugin>

Running mvn clean install throws:

Exit code: 1 - Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: org/thymeleaf/templateresolver/ITemplateResolver
    at java.base/java.lang.Class.getDeclaredConstructors0(Native Method)
    at java.base/java.lang.Class.privateGetDeclaredConstructors(Class.java:3373)
    at java.base/java.lang.Class.getConstructor0(Class.java:3578)
    at java.base/java.lang.Class.getConstructor(Class.java:2271)
    at jdk.javadoc/jdk.javadoc.internal.tool.Start.preprocess(Start.java:763)
    at jdk.javadoc/jdk.javadoc.internal.tool.Start.begin(Start.java:371)
    at jdk.javadoc/jdk.javadoc.internal.tool.Start.begin(Start.java:342)
    at jdk.javadoc/jdk.javadoc.internal.tool.Main.execute(Main.java:63)
    at jdk.javadoc/jdk.javadoc.internal.tool.Main.main(Main.java:52)
Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: org.thymeleaf.templateresolver.ITemplateResolver
    at java.base/java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:445)
    at java.base/java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:592)
    at java.base/java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:525)
    ... 9 more

Command line was: /usr/lib/jvm/java-17-openjdk-amd64/bin/javadoc @options @packages

But thymeleaf version 3.1.3.RELEASE includes this class. Do any of you have an idea of the problem? I can't find any information about it...
